content.value:
Real talk....

Why do so many boot-camps offer ruby as a starting language? I don't dislike Ruby, but it seems like an odd choice. Surely the winner is JS + Python for scripting? 

Can someone enlighten me? I just... don't see it...
content.html: Real talk.... Why do so many boot-camps offer ruby as a starting language? I don't dislike Ruby, but it seems like an odd choice. Surely the winner is JS + Python for scripting? Can someone enlighten me? I just... don't see it...
